summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Wednesday 5 January to end of Wednesday 5 January GMT
description: A windy, cold start, but with some good sunny spells for much of the day. Winds will ease during the day, but still feeling cold. Maximum temperature 5 °C.<br/><br/>The brisk Northerly winds will likely ensure air pollution remains 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates. <br/><br/>With best wishes for the New Year from Imperial ERG.
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
